participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, Emily loves to engage in conversations about music and films. She's friendly and enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_1.background: I love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. My favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. I am a blonde girl with really short hair. I am rather skinny as I like to stay in shape. My favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is passionate and thoughtful, often advocating for social issues. She enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing her opinions with others.
participant_2.background: I am a feminist. I buy only organic food products. I spend a lot of time browsing the internet. I have solar panels on my roof. I love social media, especially Twitter.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games and listen to music.
Me too! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
Me too! I love bands like The 1975 and The Neighbourhood.
Oh, I love those bands too! I also like The Strokes and The Libertines.
Those are great bands! I'm going to see The Libertines in concert next month.
Oh, I'm jealous! I would love to see them in concert.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to read and go to the movies.
Me too! I love reading and going to the movies.
What kind of movies do you like to see?
I like all kinds of movies, but I'm really into indie films.
Me too! I love finding new indie films to watch.
I'm glad to see another indie film fan!
Me too! I love talking about indie films with people.
Me too! It's always nice to find people who share your interests.
